VREyeParameters.summary: IMPORTANT Deprecated The VREyeParameters interface of the WebVR API represents all the information required to correctly render a scene for a given eye, including field of view information.

blockquote.para: Note: This interface was part of the old WebVR API. It has been superseded by the WebXR Device API.

remarks.para: This interface is accessible through the method.

blockquote.para: Warning: The values in this interface should not be used to compute view or projection matrices. In order to ensure the widest possible hardware compatibility use the matrices provided by .

remarks.para:
-WebVR API homepage
